rows.label: tlk4232014101_msg0001
rows.name:
This mercenary group pays more than the last one,
and everyone is so nice, mo!

rows.label: tlk4232014101_msg0002
rows.name:
Even if another place offers to hire Bamibami
with better conditions, I have no intention
of leaving, mo.

rows.label: tlk4232014101_msg0003
rows.name:
Because there's no other mercenary group
that has all-you-can-eat mushrooms, mo!
